verses.content: Hieng ang hin Lalpa PATHIEN chun a mîn entir a; en ta u, mâwng nuhnung lem a mâwng ṭan- tirnaa chun khâuṭhikṭhi a siem a; ngai ta u, lal bu hlu hnunga mâwng nuhnung lem a nih.
Chun, chu rama hlohna chu an fâk zo hnungin, “Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, ngaidam rawh, ka ngên che hi; Jakob chu iengtin am ngîr thei a ta, ama a chîn sih a?” ka tih a.
Hi thu tieng hin LALPA chu ân lêt a, LALPA chun, “Ni nâwk ta naw nih,” a ta.
Hieng ang hin Lalpa PATHIEN chun a mîn entir a; chun, en ta u, Lalpa PATHIEN chun meia do dingin a ko a; mei chun tui inthûk lien chu a kâng vawng a; ram khawm chu a kâng zo mêk bawk a.
chun, keiin, “Aw Lalpa PATHIEN, ma rawh, ka ngên che hi, Jakob chu iengtin am ngîr thei a ta, ama a chîn sih a?” ka ta.
Hi thu tieng hin LALPA chu ân lêt a, Lalpa PATHIEN chun, “Hi khawm hi ni ta naw nih,” a ta.
Hieng ang hin a mîn entir a, chun, en ta u, Lalpa chu enremnaa siem bang kâwlah a ngîr a, a kuta chun enremna chu a chawi a.
Chun, LALPA chun ka kuomah, “Amos, ieng am i hmuh a?” a ta. Kei chun, “Enremna,” ka ta. LALPA chun, “Ngai ta, ka mi Israelhai lai enremna sieng ka ta, anni chu khêl nâwk ta naw ning a;
chun, Isak bâwlhmunhai chu rausan hung nîng an ta, Israel hmun inthienghai chu suksiet nîng a tih, chun, Jeroboam sûnghai chu kâwl- hnâmin do ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, Bethel khaw thiempu Amazia chun Israel lal Jeroboam kuomah, “Amos chun Israel sûnghai lai chun a phierrûk cheh a, ram chun a thu po po chu a tuor thei nawh.
Amos chun hieng ang hin a ti sih a, ‘Jeroboam chu kâwlhnâmin thîng a ta, matheiloin a rama inthawkin Israel chu salah ṭhuoi suok a ta,’ tiin thu a thawn a,” tiin.
Chun, Amazia chun Amos kuomah, “Aw nang zâwlnei, fe la, Juda ramah tlân hmang la, chutaka chun bu fa la, thu hril rawh;
nisienlakhawm, Bethel khuoah thu hril nâwk ta naw rawh: lal hmun inthieng le lal in a ni leiin,” a ti bawk a.
Chun, Amos chun Amazia kuomah, “Zâwlnei ka ni nawh a, zâwlnei naupa khawm ka ni bawk nawh; ran ruol vêngtu le thei- chang kûng enkawltu ka ni lem a nih;
LALPA chun berâm ruol vêng- naa inthawk chun a mi lâk a, LALPA chun ka kuomah, ‘Fe la, ka mi Israelhai kuomah thu hril rawh,’ a mi tih a.
Chuongchun, tuhin LALPA thu chu hre rawh, ‘Nangin Israel kalin thu hril naw la, Isak sûngkuohai kalin i thu inthla naw rawh,’ i tih a;

chuleiin, LALPA chun hieng ang hin a ti a nih, ‘I nuhmei chu khawpuiah nawchizawr nîng a ta, i naupasalhai, i naunuhmeihai chu kâwlhnâmin tlûng an ta; i ram chu inkhina hruiin sem an ta; chun, nangma ngei khawm ram thieng naw sûnga chun thîng i ta, matheiloin, Israel chu a rama inthawkin salah ṭhuoi hmang an tih,’ tiin,” a dawn a.
